name: Altruist
desc: Altruists heal the lowest Health ally for 15% of damage they deal. Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist.
abstract: team:AR/MR:(10/20/40); bond:heal lowest ally:15% of damage dealt

name: Arcanist
desc: Arcanists gain Ability Power and grant Ability Power to allies.
stats: 50 AP for Arcanists; 20 AP for others
90 AP for Arcanists; 50 AP for others
135 AP for Arcanists; 135 AP for others

name: Behemoth
desc: Behemoths gain increased Armor and Magic Resist. Whenever a Behemoth dies, the nearest Behemoth gains 50% more for 8 seconds.

name: Bruiser
desc: Your team gains 100 maximum Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.
stats: 80% Health; Every 3 seconds, Bruisers deal 6% HP bonus physical damage on their next attack.

name: Dragonlord
desc: After 8 seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage to enemies and granting all allies Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
stats: 10% HP damage and Stuns for 1.5 seconds.

name: Dryad
desc: Dryads gain Ability Power and 150 Health. Each enemy death grants permanent additional Health.

name: Duelist
desc: Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attack, stacking up to 12 times.

name: Exalted
desc:
Your team gains 7% bonus damage, plus more based on your level.

After combat, store XP in a Soul Core. Sell the Core to claim the XP.

Each game a different set of units is Exalted.

name: Fated
desc: Hover one Fated unit over another to form a pair and unlock a Fated Bonus. Your pair gains 20% HP.
stats: All Fated champions get 200% of the Fated Bonus
All Fated champions get 300% of the Fated Bonus
All Fated champions gain 300% of EVERY Fated Bonus

name: Fortune
desc:
When you lose a fight, gain Luck. The more fights in a row you lose, the more Luck you get.

Lose Luck when you win.
stats: Roll a die; in that many player combats, hold a Festival! At the Festival, you have the option to convert your Luck into rewards.
Heal 2 player health at the start of each player combat.
Fortune smiles! Gain extra rewards and more luck every turn no matter what, and hold a Festival every turn.

name: Ghostly
desc:
Upon dealing or taking damage 5 times, Ghostly units send 2 spectres to haunt nearby enemies and heal 2% max Health every 2 seconds.

Haunted enemies take bonus damage for each spectre on them, and pass spectres on death.

name: Heavenly
desc:
Heavenly units grant unique stats to your team, increased for each Heavenly unit in play.
Heavenly units gain 70% more.

Kha'Zix - +10% Crit chance
Malphite - +8 AR/MR
Neeko - +60 HP
Qiyana - +10% AD
Soraka - +10% AP
Wukong - +10% AS
Emblem - +5% Omnivamp

2-stars grant 30% more.
3-stars grant 50% more.

name: Inkshadow
desc:
Gain unique Inkshadow items. Inkshadow champions gain 5% bonus damage and damage reduction.

Which Inkshadow items you get changes each game.
stats: An Inkshadow item (Different from each game)
An Inkshadow item (Different from each game), and 11% more bonus damage and damage reduction.
An Inkshadow item (Different from each game), and 17% more bonus damage and damage reduction.

name: Invoker
desc: Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.
stats: 20 Mana to Invokers; 5 Mana to others.
35 Mana to Invokers; 20 Mana to others.

name: Mythic
desc:
Mythic champions gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage.

After 4 player combats, they become Epic, increasing the bonus by 50%.
stats: Instantly become Epic. The bonus is increased by 250% instead.

name: Porcelain
desc: After casting, Porcelain champions boil, gaining Attack Speed and taking less damage for 4 seconds.

name: Reaper
stats: Reapers' Abilities can critically strike and they gain 25% Critical Strike Chance.
Additionally, Reapers bleed enemies for 50% bonus true damage over 2 seconds.
abstract: bond:CR:(25%//); bond:Abilities can critically strike; bond:bleed for 50% bonus true damage over 2s

name: Sage
desc: Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain Omnivamp. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

name: Sniper
desc:
Innate: Snipers gain 1 Attack Range.

Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.
stats: 34.7% damage per hex. Snipers gain an additional 2 Attack Range.

name: Storyweaver
desc:
Storyweavers summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her. Storyweavers gain max Health.

Each Storyweaver star level increases Kayle's Health and Ability Power. Kayle gets 15% Attack Speed for each game Stage.
abstract: bond:HP:(60/100/150/250); Kayle gains 15% AS per stage

name: Trickshot
desc: Trickshots' abilities ricochet. Each ricochet deals a percentage of the previous bounce's damage.

name: Umbral
desc:
The moon illuminates hexes, Shielding units placed in them at the start of combat.

Umbral units in illuminated hexes execute low Health enemies.
stats: 450 Shield; 18% Health execute. More hexes are illuminated
900 Shield; 25% Health execute. Illuminate the whole board
Executed enemies have a 100% chance to drop loot; 60% Health execute

name: Warden
desc: Wardens take less damage. For the first 10 seconds of combat, they take an additional 18% less damage.
